mapper.select: select mem_id as id, pw as pw, name as name, gender as gender, reg_date as regDate, ssn as ssn, email as email, profile_img as profileImg, role as role, phone as phone, major_seq as majorSeq from member where ${option} = #{keyword}
select count(*) as count from member
select count(*) as count from member where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set pw= #{pw} , email = #{email} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from member where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
